pkgmetadata.longdescription: # resoto-plugin-cleanup-expiredResoto plugin for cleanup of expired resourcesThis plugin looks for resources with the tags `expiration` or `resoto:expires` and flags them for cleanup if they are expired.## Tag format| Tag | Format | Description || ---------------- | --------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- || `resoto:expires` | `2019-09-05T10:40:11+00:00` | ISO 8601 Timestamp || `expiration` | `24h` | A timedelta relative to the resource's creation time |Example of valid units for the `expiration` tag:```weeksdayshoursminutes```Each of them can be abbreviated down to one letter. E.g. `7d`, `24h`, `60m`, etc. A space in between the numeric and the unit is optional, meaning `7d` and `7 days` are equivalent.## UsageIn `resh` execute```> config edit resoto.worker```and find the following section```plugin_cleanup_expired: # Enable plugin? enabled: false```
